PART A QUESTION 1 RUBRIC

 

 

CRITERIA

MARKS

Contents:

a.

Stating your purpose. The reader should immediately know the reason of writing.

 

b.

Provide background information about the problem as well as the propose solution.

 

c.

Present the programs to be used in order to solve the problem.

 

d.

State the cost of the program. Details the expenses as well as the benefits of your project.

 

e.

Summarizes benefits in conclusion

 

 

/15

Mechanics:

a.

Excellent word choice.

b.

No spelling errors.

c.

No grammar errors

d.

No mechanical errors

 

/10

Format:

a.

No errors in format as specified in assignment.

 

b.

No spacing errors.

 

 

 

 

 

/5

TOTAL

 

/30
